Ramhorn/Mosquitor/Ramhorn/Counter Punch/Injector/Manterror:


Ramhorn yelled, jumping to the left, a "glob" of acid hitting him in the left 
side.  Hitting the ground, he cried out in pain, rolling to take away some of 
the pain, facing down so it didn't continue to burn inwardly of him.

----

Counter Punch laughed as the Maximal (Triceradon) had fallen from his attack. 
 Beginning to turn, numerous shots sent him flying back 5 feet due to his 
unstable standing (from having one foot up, and one foot down while walking).

----

Injector had seen Counter Punch fall from Stegotron's attacks.  Raising his 
optics so Stegotron was in perfect view, he fired a single green optic blast 
at Stegotron's chest, simultaneously firing three stinger missiles from his 
hand-held launcher.

----

Manterror was laughing, but stumbled back, falling on his butt when Striker 
opened fire.  <Double Punch, get your skid plate over here!  To many Maximals 
are arriving>

~Acknowledged~ Double Punch replied, getting out the bridge of the Pred ship 
and charging off towards Manterror's location, cloaking into his stealth mode.

Manterror saw Striker turn to open fire at Mosquitor.  "Perfect." his 
cracking into a smile.  Raising his arms, he fired two ion disks at Striker's 
side.  Simultaneously firing a single ion disk at Dark Mouse's torso (the 
torso counts as the head, chest, and abdomen, abdomen is the region of the 
body that the stomach is in).
